Interface DrawingSequenceOwner

public interface netscape.application.DrawingSequenceOwner
{
    /* Methods
     */
    public abstract void drawingSequenceCompleted(DrawingSequence);
    public abstract void drawingSequenceFrameChanged(DrawingSequence);
}
Interface implemented by objects interested in learning when a DrawingSequence's current frame number has changed and must be redrawn, or when a DrawingSequence has reached its final frame.
See Also:
DrawingSequence

Methods

.drawingSequenceFrameChanged 

  public abstract void drawingSequenceFrameChanged(DrawingSequence aSequence)
Sent by a DrawingSequence to its owner when its current frame number changes.

.drawingSequenceCompleted 

  public abstract void drawingSequenceCompleted(DrawingSequence aSequence)
Sent by a DrawingSequence to its owner after reaching its final frame.
